Model

Class Enemy

  • java.lang.Object
    • Model.InteractiveObject
      • Model.Enemy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Enemy
extends InteractiveObject
    This class is called in the constructor of GameLogic and is responsible of keeping track of all the enemy objects on the map.
    Version:
    2015-03-05
    Author:
    Jonas Arvidsson
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • Enemy

        public Enemy(int level,
             int attack,
             int maxHp,
             int hp,

        level - The level of the enemy

    • Method Detail

      • getExpReward

        public int getExpReward()
        Getter function for the enemy objects experience. Is called when an enemy is killed to give experience to the player.
        Returns:
        expReward. The amount of experience that an enemy hold as an int.
